name: RECOMBINANT
description:
Made for the A2B2 Game Jam.

Where does all the abandoned technology end up? It has landed in the hands of the TRAIS Army, who uses galactic pollution to clog supply lines from SCHEMATIA, home of the MATICS.

It must be stopped, but avoid making contact with the nearby floating artifacts as it is known to cause SYSTEM CORRUPTION

How to Play:

WASD to Move

Mouse to Aim

Left Click to Shoot
